sections.title: Halfling Opportunist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Halfling Opportunist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: Halfling opportunists gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: Exploitive Maneuver (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: As an immediate action, the opportunist can make a combat maneuver check to use an enemy's action to gain an aid another bonus on her next skill check, attack roll, or AC while penalizing the enemy's roll.

sections.title: Trap Spotter (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: The halfling opportunist gains the trap spotter rogue talent, allowing automatic Perception checks to notice traps.

sections.title: Excellent Aid (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: The bonus received from aid another increases by +1, improving to +2 at 3rd level and +3 at 5th level when others aid the opportunist.

sections.title: Exceptionally Lucky (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: The halfling's racial saving throw bonus increases to +2 at 2nd level and +3 at 4th level.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: Functions like the rogue's sneak attack, dealing +1d6 extra damage at even levels (2nd and 4th) and stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Improved Trap Spotter (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: The range of the trap spotter ability increases from 10 feet to 20 feet at 2nd level.

sections.title: Fit In (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: The opportunist can use Disguise checks in place of Diplomacy checks to influence NPC attitudes by acting like she belongs in any situation without changing appearance.

sections.title: Opportunity Attacker (Ex) (Halfling Opportunist)
sections.description: When making attacks of opportunity, the opportunist deals sneak attack damage even if the target is not flat-footed or denied Dexterity to AC.
